narrative:
No-non complaint items noted this inspection.  
Applicant wants to be licensed as a class A breeder.
Please issue a class B license.
License fee will be sent by the applicant to:
USDA, APHIS, AC, ERO
920 Main Campus Dr.
Suite 200
Raleigh, NC 27605
NO REGULATED ACTIVITY MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL USDA LICENSE IS OBTAINED.
Inspection and Exit conducted with Applicant, Shannon Sebera, ACI and Randy Coleman, ACI.

Coleman Randall, Animal Care Inspector
